definition: clown/2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox/ancient Chinese compass point: 30°
clown/2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox/ancient Chinese compass point: 30°
to defame/to libel/to defile/to smear/to vilify
shameful/scandalous/to be humiliated/to make a fool of sb or oneself/to make sb lose face
lit. family shames must not be spread abroad (idiom)/fig. don't wash your dirty linen in public
pinyin: jia1 chou3 bu4 ke3 wai4 yang2

sentences.english: She had been sitting on them for a very long time.
sentences.chinese: 难道长得丑是一种罪吗？

sentences.english: If being ugly were a crime, I'd have to arrest half the people in this city.
sentences.chinese: 如果相貌丑也要抓，那这城里一半人都要蹲牢里了。

sentences.english: If being ugly were a crime, you'd get the electric chair.
sentences.chinese: 如果长得丑是一种罪的话，那你就应该被电刑处死。

sentences.english: It's a gutsy move to wear ugly clothes.'
sentences.chinese: 穿丑服装是个勇敢的举动。

sentences.english: He is not handsome but ugly.
Honestly, this one looks a little ugly.
sentences.chinese: 坦白讲，这个看起来有点丑。

sentences.english: The baby's less ugly than you.
eBay has consistently had one of the ugliest websites on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 易趣网依旧一如既往的丑。

sentences.english: And all they foul that thy complexion lack.
sentences.chinese: 一切缺少你的颜色的都是丑。

sentences.english: Also in mock trials judges give longer prison sentences to ugly people.
sentences.chinese: 在模拟审判中，法官会判丑的犯人更长的徒刑。

sentences.english: But he said that the works were ugly like Hongshan culture.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他却说“要‘丑’得像红山文化”。

sentences.english: The scandal he was involved in before detracts his from great glorious.
sentences.chinese: 他以往卷入的那件丑问已使他的光辉业绩大为失色。

sentences.english: Never get into fights with ugly people, If one day - Qzone log, they have nothing to lose.
sentences.chinese: 相对不要和长得丑的辩论，他们曾经没甚么可输的了。

sentences.english: If Jack's in love, he's no judge of Jill's beauty.
sentences.chinese: 如果杰克爱上了吉尔，吉尔再丑他也说俏丽。

sentences.english: Despising herself for being so ugly, my mother would leave herself alone.
sentences.chinese: 因为丑，自惭形秽的母亲一向都是孤独和寂寞的。

sentences.english: The ugly girl saw in its face her husband's eyes, and her husband's nose.
sentences.chinese: 丑女孩在它的脸上看到了她丈夫的眼睛和鼻子。

definition: good-looking/nice-looking/good (of a movie, book, TV show etc)/embarrassed/humiliated
ugly people will do all kinds of weird things to get attention (idiom)
